bio: So we put our cool new original awesome excellent medical theory into a chart, then we wrote a book to explain the chart(Grove Body Part Chart:A medical Arts innovation), then we wrote another book called DIY medicine:A repair manual, & now we are writing a third book called Algae+Rhythm, Algae-Rhyme:Apt surgical rotation App, & then we called this series the Grove health Science Series, & Amazon told us we should give people a free read so we could get readers & become known as authorities, so we did do that, & so if you go to our website at http://www.GroveCanada.ca you can totally read all three books for free(yes even the 3rd one, while it is still in progress can be read)...& now people are telling us things like that is so great & what you are saying is true & people are getting well-er, I mean better, & well that is a good thing & also watch the explaining video on the site too, cause that is easier than reading & we promise we are trying to make that video more exciting, which is harder cause it's like 23 minutes, but worth it for the content... Harvard, Sarah Lawrence, McGill, Atkinson, York, Humber, U.T.S., Toronto French School, Judy Jordan Dance, Young People's Theatre, U of T., Ceramics at Y, Horseback riding school, PADI Scuba diving certificate, artbizblog online lessons... U.T.S. T.F.S. GroveCanada.ca self-employed visual artist
